long_description: An agile and efficient ride on city streets, commutes and tours, the Cannondale Quick SL 1 bike features a light "SL" frame, a smooth carbon fork and easy-shifting Shimano 105 and Tiagra components. SL version features refined, lightweight frame tubing and an integrated seat binder to save weight over the standard Quick frame. 6061 aluminum frame features a carbon fork for a versatile, comfortable ride on everything from jaunts to the store to century-length charity rides. Frame also features exaggerated Synapse Active Vibration Elimination (S.A.V.E.) design in seatstays and chainstays to reduce road vibration. Flat handlebar offers an upright riding position for comfort and visibility. BB30 bottom bracket shell increases stiffness for improved power transfer. FSA compact crankset and wide-ranging 12-30 cassette offer just-right gearing to spin comfortably up hills and down descents. Shimano Tiagra shifters, 105 rear derailleur and Tiagra front derailleur ensure fast, precise shifts between the 20 gear combinations. Mini-V linear-pull brakes make easy work of speed management. Fast-rolling 700c wheels are outfitted with Kenda Kwick Roller Sport tires for all-around riding. Specs on the Cannondale Quick SL 1 bike are subject to change.
